name: Mission: Escape from Island 2
description: Mission: Escape from Island 2 - a sequel of the great shooter with amazing graphics! At this time, you expect more exciting plot twists, the crowds of menacing enemies and huge levels in the dangerous jungles of the island!
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP and newer Processor: 2.0+ GHz Memory: 512 MB RAM Graphics: Integrated Graphics Storage: 280 MB available space Sound Card: Integrated Audio
